aboutContent: First-year student in Networks and Telecommunications, I am learning the fundamentals of networks and telecommunications. I use tools like Wireshark for packet analysis and Cisco Packet Tracer for network design and simulation. I also practice web development with HTML and CSS, and write simple Python scripts for educational projects.
Always seeking new knowledge, I strive to stay up-to-date with the latest technology trends and create projects that push the boundaries of whatâ€™s possible.

projectsContent.title: Password Generator
projectsContent.description: For this project, I designed an online password generator accessible to everyone, covering all steps from the idea to deployment. The interface is simple and intuitive for generating unique and secure passwords.

projectsContent.title: Custom Quiz
projectsContent.description: This project is an interactive online quiz designed to test knowledge on various topics. It uses the Open Trivia DB API to generate infinite questions.

projectsContent.title: Calculator
projectsContent.description: I created a fully functional online calculator accessible from any browser. The interface is intuitive and includes all standard functions.
